mapper.sql: id, contract, tokenid, name, totalsupply, symbol, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime, logo
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_ont_oep8 (contract, tokenid, name, totalsupply, symbol, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime, logo ) values
(#{item.contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tokenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into tbl_ont_oep8
id,
contract,
tokenid,
name,
totalsupply,
symbol,
description,
contactinfo,
createtime,
auditflag,
updatetime,
logo,

mapper.update:
update tbl_ont_oep8
contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tokenid = #{tokenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_ont_oep8 set contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tokenid = #{tokenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.contract as ContractHash, b.Name, GROUP_CONCAT(a.tokenid) as TokenId,GROUP_CONCAT(a.TotalSupply) as TotalSupply, GROUP_CONCAT(a.Symbol) as Symbol, GROUP_CONCAT(a.Name) as TokenName, b.Description, b.ContactInfo, b.CreateTime, b.UpdateTime, b.Logo, b.ABI, b.Code, b.TxCount, b.Creator, b.Addresscount, b.OntCount, b.OngCount from tbl_ont_oep8 a, tbl_ont_contracts b where b.auditflag = 1 and a.Contract = b.contract GROUP BY a.contract order by Createtime asc limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}
select count(distinct a.contract) from tbl_ont_oep8 a,tbl_ont_contracts b where b.auditflag = 1 and a.contract = b.contract GROUP BY a.contract

select contract, GROUP_CONCAT(tokenid) as tokenid, GROUP_CONCAT(totalsupply) as description, GROUP_CONCAT(symbol) as symbol, GROUP_CONCAT(name) as name from tbl_ont_oep8 where contract = #{contractHash} GROUP BY contract
select * from tbl_ont_oep8 where contract = #{param1} and name = #{param2}
